医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
在鼻淋巴管中发现大脑废物清除途径在《自然》杂志上发表的一项开创性研究中，基础科学研究所 (IBS) 血管研究中心主任 KOH Gou Young 领导的韩国研究人员发现了鼻后部独特的淋巴管网络，该网络在鼻后部发挥着关键作用。从大脑中排出脑脊液（CSF）的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240127/Brains-waste-removal-route-found-in-nasal-lymphatics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240127/Brains-waste-removal-route-found-in-nasal-lymphatics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4fb2bb00-7618-441e-875e-e7c1ab0be3b1 Sat, 27 Jan 2024 07:04:59 -0500 Brain's waste removal route found in nasal lymphatics
Prime编辑将基因治疗提升到一个新的水平该研究由上海交通大学医学院附属第九人民医院眼科范贤群教授领导。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240127/Prime-editing-takes-gene-therapy-to-the-next-level.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240127/Prime-editing-takes-gene-therapy-to-the-next-level.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fc4f13bb-46c9-4bd1-95e0-1ed176c5b90d Sat, 27 Jan 2024 06:50:08 -0500 Prime editing takes gene therapy to the next level
新应用程序提高了参与管理重症患者的护士的护理协调能力为了提高参与危重病人生命支持管理的护士的护理协调能力，电子应用程序-； NCCCS-;由东邦大学的泷口千惠副教授和国际保健福祉大学的井上智子教授开发。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240127/New-app-improves-care-coordination-competency-of-nurses-involved-in-managing-cruitly-ill-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240127/New-app-improves-care-coordination-competency-of-nurses-involved-in-managing-riticly-ill-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1bbb4d4f-e0f7-4d19-ae72-8dc61b8ead06 Sat, 27 Jan 2024 06:39:11 -0500 New app improves care coordination competency of nurses involved in managing critically ill patients

研究揭示了与其他健康问题相比，人们对 COVID-19 的严重程度一项针对七个国家的大型研究揭示了与其他主要公共卫生问题相比，人们对 COVID-19 大流行的严重程度。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240127/Study-sheds-light-on-how-serious-people-find-COVID-19-compared-to-other-health-problems.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240127/Study-sheds-light-on-how-serious-people-find-COVID-19-compared-to-other-health-problems.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=08101504-7421-40fc-9a88-678bc9cb46b9 Sat, 27 Jan 2024 06:07:51 -0500 Study sheds light on how serious people find COVID-19 compared to other health problems
通过可视化肝脏脂肪变性和炎症来识别 NASH 的无创诊断工具非酒精性脂肪肝病 (NAFLD) 最近更名为代谢功能障碍相关脂肪肝病 (MAFLD)，是从非酒精性脂肪肝 (NAFL) 到非酒精性脂肪性肝炎 (NASH) 的一系列疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240126/Nonpressive-diagnostic-tool-for-identification-of-NASH-by-visualizing-hepatic-steatosis-and-inflammation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240126/Nonpressive-diagnostic-tool-for-identification-of-NASH-by-visualizing-hepatic-steatosis-and-inflammation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5b38ba44-c1f6-46fd-b766-3ca864f7a40b Fri, 26 Jan 2024 23:54:57 -0500 Noninvasive diagnostic tool for identification of NASH by visualizing hepatic steatosis and inflammation

硬化蛋白可以预防 2 型糖尿病患者患心脏病格拉纳达生物健康研究所 (ibs.GRANADA) 的 MP20-代谢和骨疾病生物标志物研究小组由 UGR Manuel Muñoz Torres 教授领导的一项研究，对硬化蛋白在预防动脉粥样硬化方面的作用提供了重要见解2 型糖尿病患者。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240126/Sclerostin-may-protect-against-heart-disease-in-病人-with-type-2-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240126/Sclerostin-may-protect-against-heart-disease-in-病人-with-type-2-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c18d8fbd-2521-4c8f-9b57-39a2a3f986ce Fri, 26 Jan 2024 22:20:00 -0500 Sclerostin may protect against heart disease in patients with type 2 diabetes
